note.p: Daughter of Harding (or Hardin) Burnley and his wife Catharine of 12 America Square, Aldgate, London. Married Joseph Hume MP at St Pancras in 1815. Mother of Maria Burnley Bathoe. Lived at 6 Bryanston Square, London in 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/679/4), 1871 (RG10/166/86/46)
London Church of England parish registers P69/Bot2/A/008/Ms09225/004 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 October 2022)
